org.numenta.nupic.datagen

Class PatternMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.datagen.PatternMachine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsecutivePatternMachine

    public class PatternMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for generating and manipulating patterns, for use in experimentation and tests.
    Author:
    Chetan Surpur, David Ray
    See Also:
    ConsecutivePatternMachine, SequenceMachine

      • PatternMachine

        public PatternMachine(int n,
                      TIntList w,
                      int num)
        Parameters:
        n - Number of available bits in pattern
        w - Number of on bits in pattern, each pattern will have a `w` randomly selected from the list.
        num - Number of available patterns Constructs a new PatternMachine

      • PatternMachine

                      TIntList w,
                      int num,
                      int seed)
        Parameters:
        n - Number of available bits in pattern
        w - Number of on bits in pattern, each pattern will have a `w` randomly selected from the list.
        num - Number of available patterns
